quirks.title: Stale closure in useEffect
quirks.description: Event handlers inside useEffect may capture stale state/props
quirks.symptom: Handler uses old values despite state updates
quirks.solution: Add dependencies to useEffect array or use functional state updates

quirks.title: Keys in lists
quirks.description: Missing or incorrect keys in mapped lists cause rendering issues
quirks.symptom: Components don't update correctly, duplicate data appears
quirks.solution: Use stable unique keys (not array index)

quirks.title: Reactivity caveats with arrays
quirks.description: Direct array index assignment doesn't trigger reactivity in Vue 2
quirks.solution: Use Vue.set() or array methods (push, splice, etc.)

quirks.title: Change detection not triggering
quirks.description: Changes outside Angular zone don't trigger change detection
quirks.symptom: UI doesn't update after async operations
